sentences.cn: 一杯加汽水的苏格兰威士忌

sentences.en: Any sparking liquid might be confused with a soda.
sentences.cn: 任何发亮的液体都会被认为是碳酸饮料.

sentences.en: He had worked at dish - washing, soda - clerking, driving a wagon.
sentences.cn: 他以前洗过碟子, 跟买汽水的干过伙计, 开过货车.

sentences.en: He is so hot-tempered and excitable, like a bottle of soda water exploding.
sentences.cn: 他脾气火暴，容易激动，就像一瓶喷溅的汽水。

sentences.en: He sucked ice - cream soda through a straw.
sentences.cn: 他用麦杆吸冰淇淋汽水.

sentences.en: He would like a glass of iced tea and a bottle of soda as well.
sentences.cn: 他想要一杯冰茶，也要一瓶苏打水。

sentences.en: I cannot toss off the glass of soda water in one gulp.
sentences.cn: 我不能一口气喝完那杯汽水.

sentences.en: I will freshen your drink with more soda and ice cubes.
sentences.cn: 我给你的饮料重加一些苏打水和冰块.

sentences.en: Ping - Pong tables , soda machines, and lots of music.
sentences.cn: 乒乓球, 汽水贩卖机, 热闹的音乐.

sentences.en: She doesn't enjoy drinking chocolate soda.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢喝巧克力汽水.

sentences.en: She drank her soda through a straw.
The barman splashed some soda in Gretchen's glass.
sentences.cn: 侍者往格丽卿的酒杯里倒了些苏打水.

sentences.en: The soda hissed in the glasses and Yusef drank greedily.
sentences.cn: 苏打水在杯子里发出咝咝的声音来,尤塞夫贪婪地喝着酒.

trans.tran_cn: 苏打，碳酸钠，苏打水，汽水，苏打点心
trans.tran_en: water that contains bubbles and is often added to alcoholic drinks
